src_original: sthānañ ca sthānato 'sthānañ cāsthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ karmaṇāṃ karmasvakatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,

parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānām indriyavarāvarajñānatāṃ yathābhūtam (PSP_6-8:60)  prajānāti, parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ nānādhimuktikatāṃ yathābhūtāṃ prajānāti,  anekadhātuṃ nānādhātukaṃ lokasaṃniveśaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
